ComicInfo.Summary: Thundercrack: The C.A.B.A.L. offer to protect Professor Daedalus's base. Lady Pippa tries to deal with a C.A.B.A.L. agent. The British government launches an attack on Professor Daedalus's base.
ComicInfo.Title: Thundercrack
